name: Toghairm
description:
This game is in early development.

A horror adventure based in the early 00's on my experience as a delinquent exploring abandoned buildings.

Controls

  • WASD to Move
  • Z (in the dark) to take out lighter
  • F to inspect
  • E to close menus and popups.

I've got quite a way to go and had originally planned to keep this game quiet and to myself until it was ready which I planned for October but of course my laptop died and I can't work on it until I get a new laptop but that's probably going to take months of saving up so here's what I got so far. 

A few areas are inaccessible but have been drawn. Once I can get back to work I will add them in and finish setting up atmosphere, then move on to adding the actual horror bits. Then I planned to make another pass on the character sprite and the scenes to clean up the art and add detail.
